name: Reshape Drones - Recovery Run (Free)
description:
A new endless flight platformer, where you control the drones of Re_, the recovery bot, to change the speed and slide direction as you fly through ancient alien temples to collect the left over fuel cells and charge the Pyramid temples.

This is a demo version of the full game. Reshape Drones - Recovery Run will be available soon on Android, iOs and Windows soon.

* For better experience play in full screen mode
